ai-atk-s0101a4:49_24: The youth went to a young man
ai-atk-s0101a4:49_25: he said to the senior monks, “You should worship the Elder,
ai-atk-s0101a4:49_26: The King is greatly intelligently worshipped the Elders –
ai-atk-s0101a4:49_27: “I don’t say this to perfection, but proceed having achieved it that I have attained perfection of virtue, yet I describe it as an ordinary person who is known!”
ai-atk-s0101a4:49_28: But if he is of one who is virtuous and deceiveds, yet he recites them with wisdom the four ends of virtue and understanding, and who is virtuous and depressed with wisdom, he reaches them with understanding.
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_0: But why does the brahmins say:
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_2: “Brahmin, the brahmin lady extends wisdom regarding the five precepts,
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_3: they don’t know what is beneficial
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_4: What if I were to show off the fruit of a brahmin who is master of the paths of good morals, the fruit of good morals, and of the fruit of perfection in the Vultures?”
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_5: Then he asked the reason for his sake, saying:
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_6: “But brahmin, what is that ethical conduct?”
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_8: “Having answered with the question of his own attainment, he answered the question of (thought):
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_9: but when the ascetic Gotama returns, he asks me again and again, and then I’ll give it away.
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_10: and if it is not possible (to say): “If I get a broken bowl, I will do it.”
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_11: But, without having said this to the word of the Buddha, he does not repeat it back again, saying, “I am able to make a living in my presence for himself.”
ai-atk-s0101a4:50_12: Herein, although this is the meaning of virtue: “We understand the next life” is the only truth, exactly the meaning of this, not the other meaning.
ai-atk-s0101a4:51_0: Then the Buddha shows his virtue to the root of an ethical person.
ai-atk-s0101a4:51_2: The meaning of this is given in the way already described. These are the three kinds of virtue in the way already stated. These are the three kinds of virtue:
ai-atk-s0101a4:51_3: He thinks, “I too am this,” and this is the first jhāna, too, in this way the four jhānas are used in the first jhāna.
ai-atk-s0101a4:51_4: Then, having shown that wisdom is said in the sense of interpreting insight, developing insight, and understanding, he instead of developing wisdom, he goes forth in having insight into the sense of investigating,
ai-atk-s0101a4:53_0: The meaning is this: born in the way already described .
ai-atk-s0101a4:53_1: whose assembly has seen me doing so, and having risen from his seat, he said:
ai-atk-s0101a4:53_2: “This is the last large one of the smallest universal monarchs. But when a young brahmin is standing on his own seat, he doesn’t get up from his seat even though he hasn’t got up from his seat.”
ai-atk-s0101a4:53_3: I rise from the seat for you, rise and fall, and I have no respect for you. But there is no danger of living creatures for my relatives and kin, I will not be any my relatives.
ai-atk-s0101a4:53_4: That’s why I rose from the seat of the Buddha to get upset with this seat, or that is why it is called “regarding” and “The Buddha” because of disrespect.
ai-atk-s0101a4:53_6: after instructing, rousing, enthusing, and cheering them in the present life with a Dhamma talk, he seized them in the present life, and after giving them a talk about the wholesome manns.
ai-atk-s0101a4:53_7: There, having performed that, the people, having risen from the virtues of that most excellent conduct, the Rains Retreat, and having risen from their seats, went away.
ai-atk-s0101a4:53_8: But brahmin, in this way the Buddha said that about the rains residence of his own Dhamma was raining and going to rebirth,

ai-atk-s0101a4:55_0: The Book of the Discourse on Soṇadaṇḍa is finished.
